Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure without amendment. With written report No. 98-436.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 857.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the conditions of a grant of certain lands to the town of Olathe, Colorado, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends existing law to convey to Olathe, Colorado, full title to certain lands, including reversionary interests in such lands. States that if specified lands are sold by Olathe prior to January 1, 1994, the town shall pay the United States either the proceeds of such sale, or the fair market value of such lands. Specifies exceptions to such requirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend the conditions of a grant of certain lands to the town of Olathe, Colorado, and for other purposes.
